Sentencas: Fuel cells are promising with advantages of higher energy conversion efficiency and lower emissions of SOX, NOX, and CO2 than conventional power systems.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is a high temperature fuel cell, which operates at 873-1273 K.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This allows SOFCs to operate with different types of fuels from both fossil and renewable sources because of their general higher tolerance to contaminants than other fuel cells.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It opens up for an easier transition from conventional power generation of hydrocarbon-based fuels to hydrogen energy by fuel cells.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With increased interest in the use of renewable fuels, fuel cells have the potential to play a significant role in a sustainable solution.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Attractive fuels, which are reviewed here and analyzed through thermodynamic calculations in this study, are methanol, ethanol, di-methyl-ether, and biogas.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is concluded that it is feasible for SOFCs to handle all the studied fuels.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Further, a CFD model of an anode-supported SOFC is simulated with biogas as fuel.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An analysis of the fuels is conducted at 1000 K, in terms of the heat required for each mole H-2 converted.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It shows that methane uses twice as much heat as methanol and di-methyl-ether do, and if efficiently distributed where needed, it can work as a possible performance enhancement.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A composed table of comparable studies in the literature of different alternative fuels is provided.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The case study of an anode-supported SOFC fueled with biogas of varying amount of methane and steam-to-fuel ratio revealed that biogas needs a high inlet temperature to enable the reforming and keep a constant current density distribution.
Titulo: Simulation of alternative fuels for potential utilization in solid oxide fuel cells
